message.entry: Check cannot be configured.
Cannot open or read the Code Analyzer Configuration from file ''{0}''.
Code Analyzer Configuration must be a valid JSON object.
Custom check name cannot be the same as existing Code Analyzer check.
Duplicate field names are not supported in JSON.
"baseConfiguration" field must be "factory" or "closestParentFolder".
"casing" field value must be "lowerCamelCase", "UpperCamelCase", "lowercase_with_underscores", "UPPERCASE_WITH_UNDERSCORES", "lowercase", or "UPPERCASE".
Custom check name must be a valid MATLAB identifier or MATLAB identifiers separated by periods.
Invalid duplicate value.
JSON string contains an invalid escape or unicode sequence.
Issue type name "{0}" not found.
Code Analyzer Configuration has an error on line {0,number,integer}.
Value must be >={0} and <={1}.
Value must be a valid regular expression.
"severity" field must be "error", "warning", or "info".
Schema version must be in the format of "<major#>.<minor#>.<patch#>".
Issue type cannot be configured.
Check name "{0}" not found.
"{0}" template pattern must have "{1}" field.
Code Analyzer Configuration must be named as ''codeAnalyzerConfiguration.json'' and be inside of resources folder to be visible by editor or code analyzer.
"rule" field must have a "template" field that specifies the template to create a custom check.
"{0}" section is supported starting version "{1}". Update the schema version.
Check name "{0}" not found, or "rule" field is missing to create a custom check.
Unknown field name.
Group name must be 'class', 'enumeration', 'event', 'function', 'localFunction', 'method', 'nestedFunction', 'property', or 'variable'.
Schema version "{0}" is incompatible with supported version "{1}".
Schema version "{0}" is ahead of supported version "{1}". Full compatibility is not guaranteed.
Unknown template pattern.
Value must be a valid JSON boolean.
Value must be a valid MATLAB identifier or MATLAB identifiers separated by periods.
Value must be a valid MATLAB identifier.
Value must be a JSON string containing text.
Value must be a non-empty JSON string or array of strings.
Value must be a valid JSON object.
Value must be a valid JSON object.
Value must be "**/*" or an empty JSON string.
Value must be a nonnegative integer.

entry.note: For in-progress work where we have not finalized error messages

message.entry: Error: {0}
